title: Settings
aboutMessage:
Version: 1.0.0

HomeServices is a doctor consultation platform that connects patients with healthcare professionals for online consultations and medical services.

© 2025 {{owner}}. All rights reserved.
privacyMessage:
HomeServices respects your privacy. Your consultation data is securely stored and encrypted. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

All medical consultations are confidential and protected by healthcare privacy regulations.
termsMessage:
HomeServices provides online consultation services connecting patients with licensed healthcare professionals.

By using this app, you agree to use the services responsibly and understand that consultations are subject to the terms agreed upon with your healthcare provider.
restartAppTourMessage: This will show you the interactive guide again when you visit different screens. Would you like to restart the app tour?
appTourResetSuccess: App tour has been reset! You will see the guide when you visit different screens.
appTourResetError: Failed to restart app tour. Please try again.
disclaimer: For educational purposes only. Always consult healthcare professionals.
